pages.text: As the saying goes, an inch of length means an inch of strength! This holds even truer for zombies – the farther away you are, the lower the chance of getting bitten. Just step outside, grab that gardening rake from your yard – it's the perfect long-handled weapon! The advantage of distance lets you torment those wretched
creatures without them laying a hand on you. Time to play gardener and rake those undead twigs and leaves out of your garden!
